duties_responsibilities.duty: Gain exposure to various projects within the Operations department at the processing plant.
Participate in professional development activities and hands-on experiences.
Build relationships with colleagues and interact with senior leadership.

education_certification.credential: Undergraduate in junior year pursuing degrees in areas such as Agri-Business, Animal Science, Food Science, Ag Leadership, Business, Supply Chain, or related field.
Demonstrated participation in extracurricular activities with a preference for a leadership role.
Valid driver's license and reliable transportation to and from work.
